biography: Eduardo Miguel Sánchez-Quiros (born December 20, 1968) is a Cuban-born American director most famous for writing and directing the 1999 microbudget blockbuster "The Blair Witch Project" alongside Daniel Myrick. Since then he has gone on to direct numerous other horror movies, including "Altered" (2006), "Lovely Molly" (2011) and "Exists" (2014).
name: Eduardo Sánchez
